name: Do Not Run - Polar Bear Chaser
name_original: Do Not Run - Polar Bear Chaser
description:
Catch the polar bear as quickly as you can, but remember, do not run.
Running will spook the bear. You do not want that to happen.

--- Controls ---

'A' and 'D' keys to move your left and right feet in the game.

'Space' to catch the bear when the prompt shows up. The prompt is a little animation of someone throwing a net.

------------------

Also available on Android, iOS and *Oculus Rift.
*Waiting for Oculus' approval, takes about 1-2 weeks.

Note: If searching for the game in Android, look up 'Polar Bear Chaser', as the exact name is not showing up in Google Play's search results.
